{"id":979610784,"question_id":4,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"12Â months","timestamp":1687732706,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/979610784/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"44.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public double findMedianSortedArrays(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) {\n        int[] lst = new int[nums1.length + nums2.length];\n        for(int i = 0; i < nums1.length; i++) {\n            lst[i] = nums1[i];\n        }\n        for(int i = 0; i < nums2.length; i++) {\n            lst[i+nums1.length] = nums2[i];\n        }\n        Arrays.sort(lst);\n        int size = lst.length;\n        if(size % 2 == 0) return (lst[size / 2 - 1] + lst[size / 2]) / 2.0; \n        return lst[size / 2];\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
